name: Horizon Focus
simpleDescription: Immobilizing a champion causes lightning to strike them

passives.name: Hypershot
passives.effects: Dealing [[ability damage]] to a champion with a [[champion ability]] at {{tip|cr|icononly = true}} 600 or more units away from the cast position marks them for 6 seconds, {{tip|standard sight|revealing}} them and increasing your damage dealt to them by 10%.

passives.name: Focus
passives.effects: Upon triggering ''Hypershot'', grant {{tip|sight}} of the {{tt|area|Grants sight through terrain and brush}} {{tip|cr|icononly=true}} 1400 units around the target for 2 seconds and apply ''Hypershot's'' mark to enemy champions within the area for 3 seconds.
